name: minotaur
description: a big creature wtih a human's body and a bull's head

features.name: charge
features.description: If the minotaur moves at least 10 feet straight towards a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a dc 14 strength saving throw or be pused up to 10 feet away and be knocked prone.

features.name: labyrinthine recall
features.description: The minotaur can perfectly recall any path it has traveled

features.name: reckless
features.description: At the start of its turn, the minotaur can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: greataxe
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 17 (2d12+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: gore
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
